verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:5
verses.text: For the living know that they shall die: but the dead know not any thing, neither have they any more a reward; for the memory of them is forgotten.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:6
verses.text: Also their love, and their hatred, and their envy, is now perished; neither have they any more a portion for ever in any thing that is done under the sun.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:7
verses.text: Go thy way, eat thy bread with joy, and drink thy wine with a merry heart; for God now accepteth thy works.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:8
verses.text: Let thy garments be always white; and let thy head lack no ointment.
